TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContourPoint extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ContourPoint>
Public Structure ContourPoint Implements IEquatable(Of ContourPoint)

summary.span: 表示 的语音内容的间距的更改。

span.span: Represents changes in pitch for the speech content of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 音调等高线定义为语音输出中指定时间位置的目标数组。The pitch contour is defined as an array of targets at specified time positions in the speech output. 每个目标都由三个参数定义。Each target is defined by three parameters. 第一个值是包含的文本在一段时间内的百分比， (数字后跟 "% ) "。The first value is a percentage of the period of the contained text (a number followed by "%"). 第二个值指定升高或降低间距的量。The second value specifies the amount to raise or lower the pitch. 第三个值指定在第二个值中指定的数字要使用的单位;百分比或赫兹 (Hz) 。The third value designates the unit to use for the number specified in the second value; either percentage or hertz (Hz). 对象由 方法获取，或用于通过方法设置的间距 。 objects are obtained by the method, or used to set the pitch contour for a by the method.

summary.span: 获取表示此数量在某个时间点在 中引发或降低间距的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the amount to raise or lower the pitch at a point in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值与属性中的值组合在一起， 以定义升高或降低间距的量。This value is combined with a value from the property to define the amount to raise or lower the pitch. 如果没有为0% 或100% 定义螺距值，则复制最近的螺距目标。If a pitch value is not defined for 0% or 100% then the nearest pitch target is copied. 螺距的所有相对值都相对于所包含文本之前的螺距值。All relative values for the pitch are relative to the pitch value just before the contained text.
